comment: Fact: You can have the best weather report show in the world, but it won't make any difference to what the weather does. The same is true of Beltway politics. But at least if you predict the path of a hurricane more accurately than others, your listeners can gain from that. How would accuracy in predicting how Trump will betray us ever help?
